{{Flavour|The slimy, smelly skin of a swamp-dwelling dragon. It confers resistance to poison on its wearer, and it may be turned into proper armour by magical means.}}

'''Swamp dragon hide''' is a body [[armour]] produced by butchering a [[swamp dragon]] [[corpse]]. It's even worse than [[leather armour]] on its own, although it does grant [[poison resistance]]. You can turn this into a much more useful suit of [[swamp dragon armour]] by using a [[scroll of enchant armour]] on it.

==History==
Swamp dragon hides were removed in [[0.19]]
